name: Save The Retro Games
description:
Use your mouse to navigate through menus.

Use your keyboard to type when neccesary.

Guess videogames names to win. Buy clues and screenshots for help.

---

You have been chosen! Only you can save the videogames of the old Golden Age!

Video games of the old Golden Age have been stolen.
Only a great gamer can recover them.
With the help of the Professor and his Tokens, get the clues that will help you in your adventure.

More than 20 worlds
More than 100 levels
More than 8 languages
More than 2 game modes
Secrets hidden around the retro gamer world.

Listen to the music of each lost video game: if you guess the name, you will recover the game; If not, you can get clues or help with a screenshot of each game.

Only a true Retro Gamer master will unlock the 3 medals that complete the game 100%!

Good luck retro adventurer!

---
